data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Edo, Nigeria to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Edo, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Edo, Nigeria humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Edo.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Lord, please make the same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead give life to those who are called by his name in the state of Edo.
data.verse: But if the Spirit of him who raised up Jesus from the dead dwells in you, he who raised up Christ Jesus from the dead will also give life to your mortal bodies through his Spirit who dwells in you.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Zarma people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Lord, give grace to the local leaders who shepherd the 901,040 believers in the state of Edo.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd. The good shepherd lays down his life for the sheep.

data.prayer: Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the state of Edo, Nigeria that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach those feeling unsafe in Edo, Nigeria that they can hide under your wings
data.verse: He will cover you with his feathers, and under his wings you will find refuge; his faithfulness will be your shield and rampart.
